channel.title: When i use barrage on a monster it says i dont have enough runes
channel.description: when i use barrage on a monster, it says i dont have enough runes, but i do, i hvae a couple k in my inventory.. whast wrong.. all the player does is bend over and rise back up with his hands up in the air.. but no barrage works. please help

item.title: When i use barrage on a monster it says i dont have enough runes
item.dc:creator: @God_Tricky God Tricky
item.description:
@God_Tricky wrote:

Open client.java and press Ctrl + f and look for Ice Barrage

when u see this, if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==false))

Remove it completely

OR

look for ReplaceItems(565, 4278); // Xerozcheez: Replaces blood runes with ectos

And change the item values

Read full topic
item.source: When i use barrage on a monster it says i dont have enough runes
